price: Allaahn kakannee! Nuti dhugumatti jallina ifa ta’e keessa turre.
arabic: تَٱللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَٰلٖ مُّبِينٍ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: tal-lahi in kunnā lafī ḍalālin mubīnin
